title: Infinity and the extended real number system (cont.) - extension

blocks.name: nltle2tri
blocks.content: Negated extended trichotomy law for 'less than' and 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nltle2tri(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wn(w3a(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wn(w3a(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c0))), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))
  xrltletr(c0, c1, c2)
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wn(w3a(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
  sylibr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2))), wn(w3a(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c0))), wo(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2))), wo(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0)))), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  impd(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wo(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
  com23(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wo(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
  ex(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wo(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0)))))
  syl(wa(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2))), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wo(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0)))), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  impcom(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  id(wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))
  expcom(wbr(c0, clt, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wo(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
  olcd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0)))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0)))
  biimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
  xrltnle(c0, c2)
  a1d(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c2))), wo(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
  orcd(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0)))
  id(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))))
  bitri(wn(w3a(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c0))), wo(wn(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, cle, c0))), wn(wa(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
  notbii(w3a(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c0)), wa(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c2, cle, c0)))
  df-3an(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c0))
  ianor(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c2, cle, c0))
}
